amendment.description: To require a study of law enforcement staffing needs of Indian Tribes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1162 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1162 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6313) To require a study of law enforcement staffing needs of Indian Tribes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1162 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1162 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 948.
